item.description:
Clean out your closets, lockers, basements, trunks …. of all nautical leftovers or unwanted items.
Palmer Cove Yacht Club is having a Nautical Yard Sale.
You can set up a table for $5. What a bargain!
This is your chance to clean out, have some fun and make a little money!
Yard sale is set for Saturday May 19
PCYC will advertise a 9AM start
If you plan on setting up a table, you should arrive around 8 and be ready for "early birds"
The people setting up the tables are often the biggest buyers.
The main rush is over by 10 but we advertise 9 to 11.
Fee is still $5.
Spread the word to any others that might be interested. The more goodies the better for all.
The more sellers we have, the better.
We usually have a great turnout.
Sell anything from dinghy's and kayaks to fishing tackle and old hardware
item.name: Palmer Cove Yacht Club is having a Nautical Yard Sale.
